alert.note: Alert for Grand Traverse (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 22 at 3:01PM EDT until July 22 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Gaylord
info.description: The National Weather Service in Gaylord has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Grand Traverse County in northern Michigan... * Until 330 PM EDT. * At 300 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Interlochen, or 11 miles northeast of Thompsonville, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Interlochen State Park around 310 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Interlochen. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
